dialogue: We spent the first 45 minutes trying to get our online collaboration tools to work.
Then we couldn't agree on what we were trying to accomplish.
I couldn't understand most of the attendees because they were on speaker-phones in rooms with bad acoustics.
I randomly agreed to a few things, but I don't know what.
I thought you said it went better than you expected.
It did. I go into every human encounter expecting to be framed for a crime I didn't commit.
I really need to find a problem I can fix.
